Class DrohnenSchwarm

java.lang.Object
task1_drone_swarm.DrohnenSchwarm
public class DrohnenSchwarm extends Object
This class is used to store and manage data from the drone swarm * @author lkoelbel * @matnr: 21487

      public ArrayList<String> findCollisions()
      This function determines id there ahs been a collision between two drones at any point in the recorded data
      Returns:
      A list of log messages for any collision

    • findLowBattery

      public ArrayList<double[]> findLowBattery(double _treshold)
      This function finds drones with a low battery and returns there position
      Parameters:
      _treshold - Threshold for low battery detection
      Returns:
      List of drones in the following format: array(id,x,y,z)

      public void generiereSimulationsdaten(int _amountOfDrones, int _simDuration)
      This function creates simulation data for testing this class
      Parameters:
      _amountOfDrones - The amount of drones to be included in the simulation
      _simDuration - The time duration to be simulated (in timestamps)
